name: Laptop
description: A portable computer that is suitable for use while traveling.

name: Smartphone
description: A mobile phone with advanced features beyond making calls and sending text messages.

name: Headphones
description: Audio devices worn on or around the head for listening to audio in private without disturbing others.

name: Digital Camera
description: A device that captures photographs and stores them digitally.

name: Television
description: An electronic device used to display visual content in the form of images or videos.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: A portable speaker that connects wirelessly to devices using Bluetooth technology.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: A wearable device that monitors fitness-related metrics such as steps taken, distance traveled, and heart rate.

name: Tablet
description: A mobile computing device with a touchscreen display, typically larger than a smartphone and smaller than a laptop.

name: Gaming Console
description: A specialized computer system designed for playing video games.

name: Wireless Router
description: A device that connects multiple devices to a network wirelessly.
